v.v: This is the word of Yahweh that came to Zephaniah son of Cushi son of Gedaliah son of Amariah son of Hezekiah, in the days of Josiah son of Amon, king of Judah.
“I will utterly destroy everything from off the surface of the earth—this is Yahweh’s declaration.
I will destroy man and beast; I will destroy the birds of the heavens and the fish of the sea,
I will reach out with my hand over Judah and all the inhabitants of Jerusalem.
the people who on the housetops worship the heavenly bodies,
I will also cut off those who have turned away from following Yahweh, those who neither seek Yahweh nor ask for his guidance.”
Be silent before the Lord Yahweh! For the day of Yahweh is near;
“It will come about on the day of Yahweh’s sacrifice,
On that day I will punish all those who leap over the threshold,
So it will be on that day—this is Yahweh’s declaration—
Wail, inhabitants of the Market District,
It will come about at that time that
Their wealth will become plunder, and their houses will be an abandoned devastation!
The great day of Yahweh is near, near and hurrying quickly!
That day will be a day of fury, a day of distress and anguish,
It will be a day of trumpets and alarms
For I will bring distress upon mankind, so that they will walk about like blind men
Neither their silver nor their gold will be able to save them

v: the ruins along with the wicked.
For I will cut off man from the surface of the earth—this is Yahweh’s declaration.
I will cut off every remnant of Baal from this place and the names of the idolatrous people among the priests,
and the people who worship and swear to Yahweh but who also swear by their king.
Yahweh has prepared the sacrifice and set apart his guests.
that I will punish the princes and the king’s sons,
and everyone dressed in foreign clothes.
those who fill their master’s house with violence and deceit.
that a cry of distress will come from the Fish Gate, wailing from the Second District,
and a great crashing sound from the hills.
for all the merchants will be ruined; all those who weigh out silver will be cut off.
I will search Jerusalem with lamps and punish the men
who have settled into their wine and say in their heart,
‘Yahweh will not do anything, either good or evil.’
They will build houses but not live in them, and plant vineyards but not drink their wine.
The sound of the day of Yahweh will be that of a warrior crying bitterly!
a day of storm and devastation, a day of darkness and gloom,
a day of clouds and thick darkness.
against the fortified cities and the high battlements.
since they have sinned against Yahweh.
Their blood will be poured out like dust, and their inner parts like dung.
on the day of Yahweh’s fury. In the fire of his jealousy the whole earth will be consumed,
for he will bring a complete, a terrible end of all the inhabitants of the earth.”
